name: Kanken: Minna de Wai Wai Kanji Nou
overview: (Google Translated from Japanese WiiWare page) Kanji learning that everyone can enjoy easily! You can easily enjoy the past problems of Han exam with quiz feeling. As all questions are selective, it is a content that you can enjoy even those who do not like kanji with a sense like a quick push quiz. We can record questions from class 10 to level 1 and select the method of questions so that everyone in the family can enjoy themselves with fun kanji. In addition, if three or fewer, the computer will join the match. You can also choose the strength of the computer.
